SEARCH

Package main

package main
Main package for the Hospital Management System (HMS) application. This package contains the entry point class HMSApp, which initializes the database and launches the main application view.

The HMSApp class serves as the starting point for the HMS application. It creates an instance of DataBase to initialize the system's database and displays the main view through HMSAppView.

Since:
2024-10-26
